textAfterTable: 17 Songs Biography Born: December 8, 1945 in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, Mexico Genre: Regional Mexicano Years Active: '70s, '80s, '90s, '00s Accordion king Ramón Ayala, son of musician Ramón Cobarrubias, began playing his favorite instrument at a very young age. Inspired and supported by his parents, he performed in different public places to help his modest family. Ramón Ayala's first band experience was a group called Los Jilgueros de Marin; he later joined Los Pavoreales.
